intro: Tithymalus tristis, commonly known as the lesser tithymalus, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically range in color from white to pale yellow. The plant produces slender, branched stems and has finely divided, fern-like leaves. It is often found in moist meadows and along stream banks in temperate regions. Tithymalus tristis is known for its medicinal properties and has been used traditionally in herbal remedies.
